title: Agent Planner Development Roadmap
description: A comprehensive development plan for the Agent Planner ecosystem, including agent-planner (API), agent-planner-mcp (MCP server), and agent-planner-ui components. This plan outlines the development, release, and support strategy for both the open source project and hosted service offering.

children.title: API and MCP Refactoring

children.context: Implementation of critical API and MCP server enhancements identified during analysis, focusing on plan structure navigation, search capabilities, and management tools.

children.title: API - Plan Structure Improvements
children.description: Implement the Plan Structure API endpoints and functionality to enable efficient hierarchical queries and navigation.
children.context: Implement the Plan Structure API endpoints and functionality to enable efficient hierarchical queries and navigation.
children.acceptance_criteria:
- Create GET /plans/{planId}/structure endpoint
- Implement efficient hierarchical querying (using recursive CTEs)
- Support include_details and max_depth parameters
- Create response mapper to transform flat results into nested structure
- Add unit and integration tests
- Document API in Swagger/OpenAPI

children.title: API - Advanced Node Management
children.description: Enhance node management capabilities to support moving nodes between parents, reordering, and batch operations.
children.context: Enhance node management capabilities to support moving nodes between parents, reordering, and batch operations.
children.acceptance_criteria:
- Enhance PATCH /plans/{planId}/nodes/{nodeId} to support parent changes and reordering
- Create PUT /plans/{planId}/nodes/reorder endpoint for bulk reordering
- Implement POST /plans/{planId}/nodes/bulk for creating multiple nodes at once
- Add GET /plans/{planId}/nodes/{nodeId}/children endpoint
- Create transaction support for safe hierarchy modifications
- Add comprehensive validation
- Write unit and integration tests

children.title: API - Search and Discovery Enhancements
children.description: Implement advanced search capabilities for plans and nodes, including text search, filtering, and node discovery by name.
children.context: Implement advanced search capabilities for plans and nodes, including text search, filtering, and node discovery by name.
children.acceptance_criteria:
- Create GET /plans/{planId}/nodes/search endpoint with multi-parameter filtering
- Implement GET /plans/{planId}/nodes/by-name/{name} for name-based node discovery
- Enhance GET /plans/search with faceted search and relevance scoring
- Add pagination to all search endpoints
- Support response format customization
- Implement efficient text search (using database text search features)
- Write unit and integration tests

children.title: API - Plan Statistics and Analysis
children.description: Develop APIs for plan statistics and analytics to provide insights into plan progress, composition, and status.
children.context: Develop APIs for plan statistics and analytics to provide insights into plan progress, composition, and status.
children.acceptance_criteria:
- Create GET /plans/{planId}/stats endpoint
- Implement aggregations for status and node type counts
- Calculate completion percentages and metrics
- Add due date statistics and analysis
- Implement performance optimizations for large plans
- Write unit and integration tests
- Document API endpoints

children.title: API - Database Optimizations
children.description: Optimize database structure and queries to support efficient hierarchical operations and searches on large plans.
children.context: Optimize database structure and queries to support efficient hierarchical operations and searches on large plans.
children.acceptance_criteria:
- Review and optimize database indexes for hierarchical queries
- Consider implementing materialized paths or closure tables
- Add indexes to support text search operations
- Review row-level security policies
- Implement query optimizations for large plans
- Add result caching where appropriate
- Document optimization strategy

children.title: MCP - Core Navigation Tools
children.description: Implement essential MCP tools for navigating and exploring plan structures.
children.context: Implement essential MCP tools for navigating and exploring plan structures.
children.acceptance_criteria:
- Create get_plan_structure tool for retrieving hierarchical plan views
- Implement get_node_by_name tool for finding nodes by title
- Add list_nodes tool with comprehensive filtering options
- Ensure clear, readable formatting of complex hierarchical data
- Add appropriate error handling
- Write comprehensive tests
- Update documentation

children.title: MCP - Node Management Tools
children.description: Implement tools for managing nodes, including moving, reordering, and batch operations.
children.context: Implement tools for managing nodes, including moving, reordering, and batch operations.
children.acceptance_criteria:

- Implement bulk operations support
- Add appropriate validation for all operations
- Create clear confirmation messages for operations
- Ensure comprehensive error handling
- Write extensive tests
- Update documentation

children.title: MCP - Plan Analysis Tools and Resources
children.description: Create tools and resources for analyzing plans, generating statistics, and providing insights.
children.context: Create tools and resources for analyzing plans, generating statistics, and providing insights.
children.acceptance_criteria:
- Implement get_plan_summary tool for statistical overviews
- Create plan://{planId}/full-structure resource for structure access
- Add plan://{planId}/statistics resource
- Implement analyze_plan_structure prompt
- Create recommend_node_improvements prompt
- Format outputs with clear, readable presentation
- Write comprehensive tests
- Update documentation

children.title: MCP - Enhanced Search Tools
children.description: Enhance existing search tools with more advanced capabilities and improved result presentation.
children.context: Enhance existing search tools with more advanced capabilities and improved result presentation.
